name: Star Doge: Anonymous NSA Free Internet Message Board
name_original: Star Doge: Anonymous NSA Free Internet Message Board
description:
Are latest privacy scandals worrying you? Everyone can get to your messages? Feeling paranoid? Star Doge lets you leave messages for everyone to see, but extremely hard to find unless you have coordinates, enter new way of secret communication now!

Or just randomly fly around over 100 000 of messages left by other users and enjoy the absurdity of it all.
